summary:
ChPCO™ Certified Cost Control Professional with significant experience in oil & gas industry. Familiar with all aspects of cost management required for efficient project control. Strong mathematical background along with analytical and critical-thinking ability focused on optimization. Applying knowledge of database management systems. Possess sharp attention to detail with technical proficiency. Able to work on multiple projects of various size and complexity. 

WBS development \ Budget Preparation \ Forecasting \ VOWD \ Earned Value Management \ Cost control/cost management activities \ Cash Flow \ Planning and Control \ Post-award Subcontracts Administration \ Change management \ Accruals & allocations \ Invoice Verification \ Project Control Databases/Systems \ Dashboards \ PMC/EPC/EPCm Contracts
